name: Stephen Tierney
bio: Stephen Tierney is a lecturer in Business Analytics at The University Sydney Business School. His research interests include machine learning, computer vision, image processing, data visualisation and recommendation systems.

name: David Houseman
bio: David Houseman has a PhD in theoretical physics from University College, London, and is a tutor in Business Analytics at the University of Sydney Business School. David's interests are financial time series and statistical modelling of stock returns.
